title: Editorial Policy
main_html:
If you only read one thing:

Before contacting any provider, make sure you understand what is being offered, how credentials are verified, and what questions you need answered in writing.

Editorial policy

Editorial Policy

Independence, corrections, and advertising separation.

Independence

Editorial content is produced independently. Sponsors do not select topics, edit copy, or influence guidance.

Corrections

If you believe a page contains an error, contact us. When appropriate, we will update content and note corrections.

Funding

We may sell clearly labeled sponsorship placements. We do not sell leads or referrals.

Why this matters: clarifying expectations early reduces misunderstandings, delays, and unnecessary costs later.
